Package academy.mindswap.Connect4

Class Player

java.lang.Object
academy.mindswap.Connect4.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class is responsible for creating players for the game.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      This is the main method of the class Player where are created the players. It calls the handleServer method.
      Parameters:
      args - an array of Strings.

    • setServer

      private void setServer()
      It creates the socket that receives the hostName and Port.

      private void serverWrite()
      It's the method responsible for writing messages to the server.

    • startBuffers

      private void startBuffers()
      This method is responsible for starting the communications.

    • handleServer

      private void handleServer()
      This method is responsible for calling all the previous methods and creating a serverListener object. It starts a new thread with the serverListener.
